channel.title: How do i make my own private server?
channel.description: Ok i wanna make my own private server so people can join and pk each other and stuff...So how do i start one give me links,examples etc... please...ThankYou...and how would i make people admins and mods and stuff ThankYou

item.title: How do i make my own private server?
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“paulT”]Questions You May NOT Ask

How do I start my private server?[/quote]

DONT MAKE POLLS LIKE THAT, And read the rules for GTFO,
make ppl admins, go into their characters folder,
where it says character-rights = 0
change the 0,
0- normal player
1- mod
2- admin
3- co-owner\owner
change the 0 to one of those

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my own private server?
